explanation: [0-0] On a sunny day, a young man stands on a dirt road, wearing a striped shirt and jeans, holding a stick in his right hand. On the right side of the road is a wooden shed, and a red rooster stands at the entrance of the shed. On the left side is a yellow English doodle by LeopARTnik.
[0-2] Then, the man raises his stick, two cartoon arms appear on both sides of the rooster's body, and a yellow beam of light appears in its right hand.
